channel.title: Hacker News - English
channel.description: Hacker News articles summarized and translated to English

item.title: Show HN: Strange Attractors
item.description:
The Basics: Dynamical Systems and Chaos Theory Dynamical Systems are a mathematical way to understand how things change over time. Chaos Theory deals with systems that exhibit irregular and unpredictable behavior over time, even though they follow deterministic rules. As discussed earlier, dynamical systems are all about change over time.

Read more

item.title: S.a.r.c.a.s.m: Slightly Annoying Rubik's Cube Automatic Solving Machine
item.description:
M Slightly Annoying Rubik's Cube Automatic Solving Machine S. ILI9341 display with custom 2D&3D graphics, animations, and lip-sync. Stepper + servos for cube handling with position sensors to detect faults.

Read more

item.title: My Impressions of the MacBook Pro M4
item.description:
Online, I read from other MacBook Pro owners that the fan mostly stays off. The previous MacBook Air M1 had amazing all-day battery life already, and this MacBook Pro M4 lasts even longer. So if you’re working with a system that has <8ms.

Read more

item.title: OpenAI updates terms to forbid usage for medical and legal advice
Tim Bray on Grokipedia
item.description:
Style · The writing has that LLM view-from-nowhere flat-affect semi-academic flavor. I don’t like it but the evidence suggests that some people do. But still, it’s broadly doing what they advertise: Pushing back against “woke” positions, in this case the position that monopolization is bad.

Read more

item.title: Photographing the rare brown hyena stalking a diamond mining ghost town
item.description:
The brown hyena is the rarest species of hyena in the world. During his initial visits, he became convinced that a brown hyena was roaming the ghost town at night. The brown hyena is a shy animal, mainly active at night.

Read more
